name: Ctrl+Click to run scripts
description: Only run scripts when you click them while holding the Ctrl key.

info.text: If you just want to fix the bug where placing a duplicated block into a script runs the script, you should enable "Do not automatically run duplicated blocks" instead.
If you're on macOS, you won't be able to use Ctrl+Click as a keyboard shortcut for right-click when this addon is enabled.
